_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:21:53 using v2.0
title: How has the proportion of social care users who feel safe changed by age?
analysis_commentary: In both 2011/12 and 2012/13 a higher proportion of adults 65 and over who use social care services felt as safe as they wanted to compared to adults aged 18 to 64 years. The differences between age groups were 5.0% in 2011/12 and a difference of 5.7% in 2012/13.
